section.name: Astrogrid Integration Testing
section.p: The integration tests are executed as a maven project which is executed by a shell script maven-integration-tests.sh which lives in /mavenrun. The integration tests consist of a number of JUnit tests.

section.name: Automatic redeployment
section.p: The maven builds produce wars for all components. Before the integration tests are run these wars are grabbed from the repository and (re-)deployed to a variety of test machines. You can find out what goes where by looking at the ant script deployWebapps.xml.

subsection.name: What's next?
subsection.P: All components bar registry are being deployed, but not yet configured....
